metadata.description: AI-assisted research summaries for priority symbols

porter_forces.supplier_power: Medium — key foundries concentrated but long-term agreements in place.
porter_forces.buyer_power: Low — hyperscalers scrambling for GPU capacity.
porter_forces.competitive_rivalry: Rising — AMD catching up but still lagging in software moat.
porter_forces.threat_new: Low — capex intensity and ecosystem lock-in deter entrants.
porter_forces.threat_substitutes: Medium — custom ASICs for specific workloads remain a watchpoint.

key_strengths: Dominant position in AI/ML accelerators with 80%+ market share
CUDA ecosystem creates significant switching costs
Strong pricing power with ASPs trending upward
Expanding TAM as AI adoption accelerates across industries
key_weaknesses: High concentration risk with top 5 customers ~40% of revenue
Geopolitical exposure to China market restrictions
Supply chain dependency on TSMC for advanced nodes
Valuation premium leaves little room for disappointment
catalysts: B100 Blackwell architecture launch in Q2 2024
rows.label: Investable
rows.summary: Remain overweight as demand visibility stays strong; trim only if supply normalises faster than expected.

porter_forces.supplier_power: Medium — battery raw materials concentrated but easing.
porter_forces.buyer_power: Medium — EV incentives fading, price sensitivity rising.
porter_forces.competitive_rivalry: High — legacy OEMs rolling out EV lineups aggressively.
porter_forces.threat_new: Medium — new entrants in China remain disruptive.
porter_forces.threat_substitutes: Medium — ride sharing and public transit adoption in focus metros.

key_strengths: Leading EV brand recognition and charging infrastructure
Energy storage business showing strong growth
key_weaknesses: Heavy reliance on CEO for brand value
rows.label: Monitor
rows.summary: Maintain tactical position; wait for margin stability confirmation before adding.

porter_forces.buyer_power: Low — ETF flows driven by macro conditions.
porter_forces.competitive_rivalry: Low — limited alternatives for monetary hedge.
porter_forces.threat_substitutes: Medium — digital assets remain a hedge competitor.

rows.label: Hedge
rows.summary: Retain as macro hedge while inflation expectations stay anchored below 3%.

porter_forces.supplier_power: Medium — chip supply steady but watch AI accelerators.
porter_forces.buyer_power: Low — enterprise cloud demand sticky with high switching costs.
porter_forces.competitive_rivalry: Medium — AWS and Google Cloud continue to invest heavily.
porter_forces.threat_substitutes: Medium — open-source AI stacks could erode Azure premium.

rows.label: Investable
rows.summary: Remain core holding; upside tied to AI monetisation pace and licence retention.
